| HistoryText             = The First Eternity Battalion was an experimental unit created by the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|US Army]] which focused on black ops and psychic warfare.{{r|Ultimates 2 Vol 2 3}} Their leader, [[Emmett Proudhawk (Earth-616)|Emmett Proudhawk]], was the closest they had to an actual psychic, as the rest merely had vestiges of superpowers.{{r|Ultimates 2 Vol 2 6}}

Tragedy struck the team during a routine deployment in [[Transia]].{{r|Ultimates 2 Vol 2 5}} At [[Wundagore Mountain]], the First Eternity Battalion walked into a fight between the [[New Men]] and [[Chthon (Earth-616)|Chthon]]'s forces. The team was slaughtered. Members [[James Tensen (Earth-616)|James Tensen]] and [[Philip Nelson Vogt (Earth-616)|Philip Vogt]] became the only two survivors, with Proudhawk transforming into the [[Glossary:Psi-Force|Psi-Force]], but being belived dead.{{r|Ultimates 2 Vol 2 6}} Following this event, the Battalion was disbanded.{{r|Ultimates 2 Vol 2 5}}
